attributes.action: Get rid of the Human Rights Law NOW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many more terrorists, hate Cleric's, so called Asylum seekers, illegal immigrants, and criminals are we going to allow to escape justice or escape being thrown out of our country before we have to start throwing MP's out of government for not listening to the people who rightly live in this country?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
